snippet.title: Whispers of the Eyeless || Steam Next Fest October 2024
snippet.description:
The October 2024 edition runs October 14 at 10:00 AM PDT (UTC-7) to October 21 at 10:00 AM PDT (UTC-7).
►STEAMPAGE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2523890/Whispers_of_the_Eyeless/

Whispers of the Eyeless is a strategy RPG set in a dark fantasy world full of secrets. Infiltrate the city of Aranthor and gather resources across its districts, slay enemies through turn-based combat, guide your cult to glory, and influence the fate of Aranthor by reviving the Dead Gods.

►Main Website: https://www.hearthewhispers.com
►Discord: https://discord.gg/bqd5vSDkYV
►Twitter: https://twitter.com/WhispersEyeless
►Tik Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@whispers_official
►Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Whispers-of-the-Eyeless-115908968091840

#WhispersofthEyeless #RPG #indie #steamnextfest
